links.title: Technology Rout selloff pushes U.S. Stocks lower as Treasuries Surge - Investments Revolution
links.description: GE surges on speculation Buffett could buy a stake in company U.S. fades after European shares rise the most in six weeks A selloff in technology shares sent U.S. equity benchmarks lower, with losses accelerating late in the day. Bonds surged on demand for safe havens, pushing the yield on 10-year Treasuries below a key level.

links.title: Are the FANGs Holding Up a Weak Market? - Sizemore Insights
links.description: It remains to be seen whether the market is in the midst of a garden-variety 10% correction or if this is the start of a deeper bear market. But it does seem like this market is being held aloft buy a small handful of large-cap tech stocks: the infamous FAANGs.
